faq.a1: Absolutely yes. Code ABUNDANCE is built to be suitable for beginners, people already developing successfully, and advanced entrepreneurs. The information, environment, opportunities, and community support are valid for every stage of your growth. You get structure, steps, templates, contacts, and processes you can apply immediately.
faq.a2: Of course. This is not a standalone course — it’s a mentoring system with an active community. You have access to an internal group, regular Q&A sessions, and ongoing guidance. You’re never alone; you have support at every step.
faq.a3: It depends on how fast you take action. The value in the program is priceless — these are proven models that can pay off for a lifetime, and the investment is a tiny drop in the ocean of potential we’re about to unlock together. One decision will impact all your actions, and once you master the system, results can multiply far beyond your investment. It all comes from your execution — no guarantees, but a proven path and valuable contacts, friendships, and even partnerships.
faq.a4: No. That’s exactly why the program exists. The goal is to build every skill you need together with you so you’re confident in your entrepreneurial journey. You join, we personalize your plan, and you follow the steps while learning along the way. Everything you need is inside — you just apply it.
faq.a5: YouTube is chaos, and aimless wandering is your biggest enemy. You don’t have the system. You don’t have the tools. You don’t have a plan. You don’t have the contacts that save you years of work by helping you consistently take the right actions. Here you have an environment, people in action, and everything organized step by step as a formula that leads to results without wasting time, energy, and money. That’s the difference between information and a system.
faq.a6: Yes, every member has different privileges and priority levels depending on when they joined the community. The earlier you’re part of the movement, the more perks and bonuses accumulate. In our community we value every detail — the attitude, respect, loyalty, and most importantly, disciplined work. You join once and start receiving everything promised: lessons, materials, new versions, updates, tools, and contacts.
faq.a7: Every entrepreneur knows business has its costs. Here they’re minimized because we only use the most effective methods. Depending on the scale you operate at, an important part of your development is having active income so you can invest strategically. Depending on the business model, you may need test budgets for a website, advertising, or inventory. The difference is that here you know exactly where every dollar goes. You stop throwing money away. And if you don’t have active income yet — great, we’ll support you in starting to earn and generating the revenue that currently seems like a dream.
faq.a8: Together we’re stronger. Whether you work alone or in a team, being part of our community positions you in the absolute TOP 1% of the population. The principles I share come from over €30,000 invested in private groups worldwide, over €600,000 spent on organic, paid, and UGC ads, 7+ businesses started from scratch, and 10+ countries visited for networking. The best has been extracted for all sectors — services, products, brands, physical businesses, financial markets, AI, and more. Usually the problem isn’t the niche — it’s the lack of a system. Here you get one.
faq.a9: No. But if you’re under 18, talk to a parent or guardian — after all, you’re taking a step toward your education and future. If you think maturely and want to start earlier, the program is the right place that will save you years and hundreds of thousands in potential losses or missed opportunities.

founderStory.ctaButton: SEE HOW IT WILL WORK FOR YOU
founderStory.ctaDescription: Learn more about Sean Issa’s personal journey and growth
founderStory.heading: The Founder
founderStory.introHighlight: CODE: ABUNDANCE™ is the structured result of all these lessons. Save yourself years of wandering and pain — get your ready-made personal plan now.
founderStory.introText: He is not a theorist. He is an entrepreneur at heart and a former national athlete for Bulgaria. Every strategy, business model, and concept has been personally battle-tested in real life, and the proven practices are delivered here ready-made for every student.
founderStory.quote: "I wasn’t born with advantages. I built everything after a decade of work, testing, successes, and failures. I paid the price so you don’t have to."
founderStory.subtitle: Sean Issa — FOUNDER of CODE: ABUNDANCE™
founderStory.timeline10Point1: Built a CBD business with international reach in 8 countries.
founderStory.timeline10Point2: Marketing with influencers, yachts, luxury events, and a strong brand identity.
founderStory.timeline10Point3: The product was good, but the market remained undervalued and the business didn’t reach its potential.
founderStory.timeline10Point4: Ended up six figures in the red — debts, broken deals, unrealized projects.
founderStory.timeline10Title: Hundreds of locations, the rise, advertising, the money... and the fall
founderStory.timeline11Point1: Traveled to dozens of locations including Dubai, Marbella, London, Stockholm, Prague, Budapest, Athens, Bucharest, Berlin, Belgrade, building a network of multi-millionaires and entrepreneurs.
founderStory.timeline11Point2: Gained direct access to the most well-known major figures in the online space.
founderStory.timeline11Point3: Gathered knowledge, not showmanship. Everything was documented but not shown. Something bigger was on the horizon...
founderStory.timeline11Title: Global network, business giants, strategic positioning
founderStory.timeline12Point1: Lived in Norway in voluntary isolation for months — no friendships, no romance, no family.
founderStory.timeline12Point2: Read, meditated, and built a new inner foundation.
founderStory.timeline12Point3: Laid the groundwork for a deep personal transformation.
founderStory.timeline12Title: The exile, the solitude, the rethinking
founderStory.timeline13Point1: Developed digital marketing skills and began working with clients worldwide.
founderStory.timeline13Point2: Created new structures, services, and online businesses.
founderStory.timeline13Point3: Restored his reputation and built a new stable financial foundation.
founderStory.timeline14Point1: After the PR attacks, he took whatever work he could find — including factories, taxi driving, and real estate brokering.
founderStory.timeline14Point2: Went through difficult years that forged a steel identity.
founderStory.timeline14Point3: This period became the foundational school of his character.
founderStory.timeline15Point1: Created his own philosophy of success, leadership, and growth.
founderStory.timeline15Point2: Built a community and trained people in business, finance, personal branding, and digital skills.
founderStory.timeline15Point3: Entered his strongest period with a mission to leave a global legacy.
founderStory.timeline15Title: The system, the philosophy, the new Sean Issa
founderStory.timeline1Point1: Born in Sofia to separated parents — a Bulgarian mother and a Nigerian father.
founderStory.timeline1Point2: By age 5, he was already accustomed to independence and discipline.
founderStory.timeline1Point3: Grew up realizing the world is full of limitations, which ignited his drive to build a life without scarcity.
founderStory.timeline1Title: A divided family, scarcity, the first discipline
founderStory.timeline2Point1: Went through football, karate, basketball, canoe kayak, and swimming before discovering track and field.
founderStory.timeline2Point2: Five years of competitions and awards under the mentorship of a trusted coach in the circle of Olympian Hristo Markov.
founderStory.timeline2Point3: Built a foundation of discipline, focus, and the drive to reach the top.
founderStory.timeline2Title: Track and field and the first medals
founderStory.timeline3Point1: Discovered YouTube and the book The Secret in 4th grade, at age 10.
founderStory.timeline3Point2: Experienced an awakening to personal development and financial freedom.
founderStory.timeline3Point3: Went through the works of Napoleon Hill, Kiyosaki, Carnegie, Cardone... the founders of his mindset.
founderStory.timeline4Point1: Sold his own bicycle to start his first business.
founderStory.timeline4Point2: Bought and resold goods online, earning his first income for school pocket money.
founderStory.timeline4Point3: Realized that ambition backed by action creates results.
founderStory.timeline5Point1: Took on the challenge of selling books to 10,000 strangers.
founderStory.timeline5Point2: The streets and malls of Sofia became a school of sales and psychology.
founderStory.timeline5Point3: Overcame the fear of rejection and built extraordinary social resilience.
founderStory.timeline6Point1: After the book campaign, built a team of 100+ in classic direct sales companies.
founderStory.timeline6Point2: Worked with products like cosmetics, supplements, trading networks, and more.
founderStory.timeline6Point3: Developed leadership skills, systems thinking, and the ability to manage large-scale structures.
founderStory.timeline7Point1: From a rink newcomer, he became a professional hockey player and joined the Bulgarian national team.
founderStory.timeline7Point2: Competed in world championships and won a gold medal, as well as the "Best Player of the Game" title in the comeback against Israel — the first gold for the national team in that division in Bulgarian history (2019).
founderStory.timeline7Point3: Solidified a mindset of discipline, strategy, and resilience.
founderStory.timeline8Point1: To combine business and sport, he switched to independent study.
founderStory.timeline8Point2: This taught him to take responsibility for his development and work without the age-related pressure of his environment.
founderStory.timeline9Point1: During the lockdown period, he studied markets, Forex, and crypto.
founderStory.timeline9Point2: Achieved quick profits, sports cars, luxurious life in the UAE, but also significant losses and poor investment decisions.
founderStory.timeline9Point3: Became the subject of public accusations and criticism due to a negative PR campaign, facing the downsides of public opinion.

meetTheMaster.bioParagraph1: I'm not your typical entrepreneur. My journey didn't start with privilege or a trust fund — it started with discipline, earned through years of competitive sports at the national level. Ice hockey taught me precision. Canoe kayak taught me balance. Basketball and swimming taught me perseverance.
meetTheMaster.bioParagraph2: At 17, I was already building teams in MLM, learning the fundamentals of leadership and duplication. While most teenagers were finding themselves, I was finding my purpose — creating systems, leading people, and refusing to accept mediocrity.
meetTheMaster.bioParagraph3: But success didn't come from one path. I invested tens of thousands in mentorships, traveled internationally for masterminds, and studied under the best. I didn't just learn theory — I built empires. From financial services to wellness brands, from learning platforms to marketing agencies, each venture was a layer of mastery.
meetTheMaster.finalQuote:
"You don't rise by luck.
You rise by code."
meetTheMaster.heading: Know who you're involved with
meetTheMaster.transformTitle: From the boy selling books to survive to eccentric multi-millionaire
meetTheMaster.truthSubtitle: I partnered with the right people, worked 15h per day and built an empire
meetTheMaster.truthTitle: I didn't make my money selling courses
meetTheMaster.value1Desc: Forged through national-level competition and refined through business battles.
meetTheMaster.value2Desc: Built multiple 6-7 figure businesses by creating scalable, duplicable frameworks.
meetTheMaster.value3Desc: Not just building wealth — building movements that transform generations.

modules.heading: Complete Curriculum
modules.subheading: 4 laboratories, dozens of modules, hundreds of practical lessons
originStory.heading: The Steps I Took to Change My Life
originStory.stage1Desc: Started from nothing. No handouts, no shortcuts. Just raw determination and a refusal to quit.
originStory.stage1DialogContent:
At 16, I was out on the streets of Sofia every single day. Not for fun. Not because I wanted to. Because I had to.

I sold educational books door-to-door, approaching complete strangers with nothing but a pitch and determination. Most people slammed doors in my face. Some laughed. Others told me to get a "real job."

But I learned something those people never could: rejection doesn't kill you. It builds you. Every "no" made the next conversation easier. Every door that closed taught me how to open the next one faster.

I wasn't selling books. I was selling myself. My conviction. My belief that what I had was worth their time and money. That's when I realized — sales isn't about the product. It's about the person.

Those streets turned a kid into a closer. And that closer became an empire builder.
originStory.stage2Desc: National-level competition in multiple sports. Built the foundation of discipline that money can't buy.
originStory.stage2DialogContent:
Ice hockey. Canoe kayak. Basketball. Swimming. I didn't just play sports — I competed at the national level. This wasn't about trophies or glory. It was about forging discipline through pain.

Every early morning practice when my body screamed to stay in bed. Every loss that crushed my ego. Every coach who pushed me beyond my limits. That's where I learned the most important lesson: discipline beats talent.

The ice rink taught me precision. The water taught me balance. The court taught me strategy. But most importantly, competitive sports taught me that winners are built, not born.

When everyone else quit, I kept going. When it hurt too much, I pushed harder. That mindset carried over to everything else — business, leadership, building empires.

You can't buy that kind of foundation. You earn it through blood, sweat, and refusing to quit when it gets hard.
originStory.stage3Desc: Started at 17 building MLM teams. Learned leadership fast. Made mistakes faster.
originStory.stage3DialogContent:
At 17, I wasn't just building teams — I was learning what real leadership meant. MLM wasn't glamorous. It was brutal. But it taught me something schools never could: how to inspire action.

I stood in front of rooms full of people older than me, more experienced than me, and convinced them to follow my vision. Not because I had all the answers, but because I had conviction.

I learned to speak with authority. To command a stage. To sell dreams and deliver systems. Every presentation, every team meeting, every late-night strategy session was building the foundation of who I'd become.

Leadership isn't taught in a classroom. It's forged in the fire of real decisions, real consequences, and real results.
originStory.stage4Desc: Scaled multiple 6-7 figure businesses. Built systems, hired teams, dominated markets.
originStory.stage4DialogContent:
You don't build empires alone. You build them with the right people in the right rooms having the right conversations.

I didn't get here by accident. I surrounded myself with winners. People who think bigger, move faster, and refuse to settle. Every mastermind, every late-night strategy session, every cigar and whiskey conversation — that's where real deals get made.

Most people network. I build alliances. Strategic partnerships with people who see the vision and have the capacity to execute. When you're in rooms like this, opportunity finds you.

I invested tens of thousands in mentorships. Traveled internationally to learn from the best. Built multiple 6-7 figure brands across different industries. Not because I got lucky — because I chose the right circle.

Show me your friends, I'll show you your future. That's not a cliché. That's a fact.
originStory.subheading: From selling books door-to-door to building million-dollar systems. Every scar tells a story.

socialProof.constantEvolutionText: Every day we celebrate the successes of new creators. The information here is not static — it is periodically optimized to give you only the highest quality, battle-tested tools for your success.

socialProof.techUpdateTitle: WE ARE ON THE CUTTING EDGE
socialProof.testimonial1: I cleared the paralyzing chaos in my head that had been slowing me down for months. For the first time I have crystal clarity and a strategic plan to achieve my dream life.
socialProof.testimonial2: My income increases every month since I started following the abundance framework. The goal is clear: financial and location freedom by year-end. 2026 is the year of total freedom. Thanks to the entire team for the iron support.
socialProof.testimonial3: I was in debt 3 months ago, barely had money to take my girlfriend out. Now, a few months later, I am making more than my parents. Next to me is the same princess who believed in me even when I was lost. Thanks to Sean and his team, I developed the right habits to ensure my success. Made money online, handled tough situations, and kept my mind on point. Keep it up G's, the prize is worth the pain.
socialProof.testimonial4: The transformation is brutal haha. I can’t even believe how I lived before without direction… My current reality used to be just a painful and distant idea. Props to everyone and thanks to Sean for the massive value he puts in.

telegramChat.templateMessage: Hello! I'm interested in CODE: ABUNDANCE™ and want to learn more about the personalized diagnostic and 90-day plan. When can I speak with you?
testimonials.person1Quote: CODE: ABUNDANCE™ gave me clarity and structure. In 90 days I doubled my business and most importantly — found balance.
testimonials.person2Quote: The personalized analysis completely changed my approach to business. The system works.
testimonials.person3Quote: The best decision I made this year. The environment and mentorship are priceless.
theArchitect.ctaButton: SEE HOW IT WILL WORK FOR YOU
theArchitect.detail1: While others were playing games, I was selling books on the street. There I learned a lesson about abundance: if you can’t sell, you’re dead. Rejection didn’t stop me — it tempered me every day.
theArchitect.detail2: Sport taught me that the body is a machine. There is no 'I can’t', only 'I don’t want to'. That discipline is now at the core of the modules.
theArchitect.detail3: I led teams of people older than me. I learned to take responsibility not just for myself, but for others’ results.
theArchitect.detail4: I invested. I earned a lot. I lost everything. I fell and got back up. I learned the hard way that money without structure is just sand slipping through your fingers.
theArchitect.detail5: I conquered myself again and again to create this Code.
theArchitect.heading:
I WASN’T BORN WITH ADVANTAGES.
I BUILT EVERYTHING MYSELF.
theArchitect.introQuote: "I am not a university theorist. I am a product of my own system. Everything you see in CODE: ABUNDANCE™ has been tested not in a lab, but on the battlefield of life."
theArchitect.keyMessageHighlight: You don’t have to pay that price. You can get the ready-made plan now.
theArchitect.keyMessageText: CODE: ABUNDANCE™ is the structured result of these lessons. I already paid the price with years of time, mistakes, and pain.
theArchitect.subtitle: SEAN. The Architect behind CODE: ABUNDANCE™.
theChaos.blockageExplanation: The painful blockages you feel are your Human Design waging a fierce war against Chaos (Lack of Structure). Your massive potential remains locked because your energy leaks and dissipates without your conscious consent.
theChaos.brutalTruthLine1: How long will you keep fooling yourself that you have time while losing energy and capital?
theChaos.brutalTruthLine2: I’m telling you brutally honestly: You risk growing old poor, sick, and ignorant if you don’t uproot the problem today. The problem is your broken system.
theChaos.ctaSubtext: Find out exactly where you’re losing energy and money
theChaos.headline: THE INVISIBLE BLOCKAGE
theChaos.notLazy: You are not lazy. You are not stupid. And you are not random.
theChaos.subtitle: The Problem — Emotion: Identification & Anger
theChaos.tooltipText: Your Generator blocks and rebels because you work against your energy design. This is not laziness, it is resistance.
theChaos.youArePart2: who simply operates with the wrong tools.
theLabs.headline: 3 SPHERES → 90 DAYS → NEW REALITY
theLabs.lab1Description: Build the foundation of your financial freedom with proven business models, marketing strategies, and AI automation.
theLabs.lab2Description: Optimize your physical and mental health for maximum productivity and energy.
theLabs.lab3Description: Know yourself through Human Design, develop leadership skills, and create a life with purpose and direction.
theLabs.subheadline: Three laboratories, each focused on a critical sphere of your life
theWhy.deepTruthText: Material wealth and Spiritual power are not enemies. They are two sides of the same coin. Everything falls into perfect sync the moment you make a conscious decision.
theWhy.deepTruthTitle: The truth has its own iron structure
theWhy.greekQuotePart2: (This is the foundation of all greatness).
theWhy.keyTakeawayText: Your insurmountable difficulties are not actually problems. They are an alarming symptom that you don’t know your authentic Self. The CODE ABUNDANCE system is not just "advice". It is the uncompromising application of an eternally working law.
theWhy.solomonQuoteHighlight: "Guard your heart, for it is the wellspring of life (Abundance)."
theWhy.solomonQuotePart2: (This is the mechanism of your success).
theWhy.truthStatement: The truth is unshakable. It is the eternal, invisible bridge that transforms the abstract idea into measurable reality.
